name: person
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool watchmode.
Tool description: Universal OTT Streaming Service Availability API (Netflix, HBO Max, Peacock, Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, AppleTV+, Disney+ & over 100 more)
API description: Retrieve details about a specific person (e.g., actor, director) using their unique ID.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the person whose details are being fetched.
